Module.Content:
<script>
  let embedsrc = prompt('.SWF file here');

  const emulator = document.createElement("embed");
  emulator.type = "application/x-shockwave-flash";
  emulator.src = embedsrc
  emulator.style.width = "100%"
  emulator.style.height = "100%"
  document.body.appendChild(emulator);

</script>



<script src="https://unpkg.com/@ruffle-rs/ruffle"></script>


<style>
  html,
  body {
    margin: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

</style>
